body.name: Air Purifiers for Home Large Room up to 1740ft², H13 HEPA Air Filter for Pets Hair Dander Smoke Pollen Dust, Ozone Free, Portable Air Purifiers for Bedroom Office Living Room, E-300L, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 17 hrs 50 mins
features: POWERFUL & PORTABLE: With a high CADR index, this home air purifier covers an area of up to 1740ft², circulates air quickly by 5X air changes per hour in 350ft², 3X air changes per hour in 700ft², 1.7X air changes per hour in 1000ft². The unique size and contemporary design of E-300L air purifier perfectly fit large rooms, bedrooms, small rooms, offices, living rooms, nurseries, kitchens and basements. Compact enough for easy movement with a handheld design in the back.

Advanced 3 STAGES FILTRATION SYSTEM: Equipped with a pre-filter for large particles like lint and fur, an H13 True HEPA filter which captures nearly all airborne particles 0.3 microns in size, ridding your environment of dust, pollen, pet dander and a high-efficiency activated carbon filter for toxic fumes and unpleasant odors. This home air purifier is 100% Ozone-free, never uses UV-C light, which the research has shown can produce harmful ozone and secondary pollution.

USER-FRIENDLY: With noise levels as low as 20 dB, this HEPA air purifier is whisper-quiet for a nice sleep. You can also turn off all lights with the display button when it’s time to bed. Child lock setting efficiently prevents error operations caused by pets or children. Additionally, the check filter Indicator will let you know when it’s time for a fresh filter. (indicator light in white).

EASY OPERATION & ENERGY SAVING: Easy to turn on/off an air cleaner, set fan speed mode L/M/H) to capture as much air pollutants as required. 3 timer option (2H/4H/8H) ensures you set the air purifier operating time. Operating at just 16W at its low fan speed, alllowing you to use it all day during times of high pollution, like wildfire season. Even running it at a high speed, E-300L only costs $0.4 per week.

TRUSTWORTHY FOR LONG USE: We will always stand by our customers and continue to provide a pleasant shopping experience. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us for a satisfactory answer. Tips: Please take off the plastic bag of the replacement filter before installing a new filter.

Where can i find replacement filters? You could search Keywords: B09MLZ8FQD or B0C2TCPRZM to purchase 1/2 pack Filter, and for best performance, please use official filter. Does it come with filter? Yes. The filter is within the unit, and is in a plastic bag that has to be removed. We recommend you replace the Filter every 3-6 months. Does this air purifier produce ozone and available for California ? This E300L Air Purifiers is 100% Ozone Free and available for California. What rooms is this air purifier suitable for? This air purifier is suitable for rooms of all sizes up to 1740 square feet. It is especially suitable for living rooms, basement, bedrooms, nurseries, kitchens, dining rooms and offices. Steps and Precautions for Use 1. Please keep it away from sunlight and ventilated. Can not be used at high temperature for a long time. 2. Please try to avoid humid environment, should stop use in thunderstorm weather, and do not put the power adapter on the warm object.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done well
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier checked all the boxes it needed for me. It's small and compact to fit in the area I needed it without being in the way. It is quiet, although when putting up the fan level you can hear it. Truthfully sound is not a bother to me on this but it could be at the higher levels for some. The controls are easy to use, the only area I have an issue with is locking it from the child lock which could be a user issue moreso then the device. I've been impressed with this machine and how much it really has changed the air quality for how small it is in the large area it is in. I'd purchase this exact one again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purifiers Do the Job
reviews.reviewText: I bought two purifiers and have been very pleased with the results and with the low noise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Best for the price
reviews.reviewText: I've bought 3, and I have to say, I'm extremely impressed. They really work. Can't beat the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have 5 of the Coways, and this one is just as good for about half the cost. I have animal manure fertilizer in the garage, and this filters the odor even. I have a high ceiling 3.5 car garage that fits my lifted F-250 Superduty. Plus the filters are easy and cheap and doesn’t need a pre-filter. I'm sure you can Jimmy one in the font, but the price of new filters makes it hard to justify the effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great air mover!!
reviews.reviewText: I bought three different brands of machines and this one is by far my favorite. It moves a lot of air and refreshes it almost instantly. It is a little noisy on high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The proof is in the filters!
reviews.reviewText: 2 adult home cleaned regularly, also good to note we a golden retriever, and a pellet stove as our main source of heat. This unit is placed in the living area, approximately 1000 sqft next to the pellet stove. It’s done a phenomenal job thus far, proof is in the filter picture, which that filter is 6 weeks old. In terms of sound it’s very quiet. Overall great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing actually works! Good price around $89.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Caution… Lasted 1.5 years
reviews.reviewText: Buy with caution. It worked great for a while and I kept it clean and changed filters every 4-5 months but then about a year in noticed it wasn’t as good so I changed filter every 3 months and now it just doesn’t work. I got this and a Levoit at same time and levoit is still working great! Customer service was good but could only offer small discount on a new one so I passed. Should work longer than 1.5 years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Scam, it faulty and blew my sockets when i connected
reviews.reviewText: It smaller then photos, it blew my sockets and returning u will have pay. Dont risk it
